creator: trundl Limited
descriptionHtml:
This is the BETA version of the app.
trundl is an outdoor walking subscription app that motivates people of all abilities towards a healthy and purposeful lifestyle through outdoor exercise, a reduced carbon footprint and connection with important UK outdoor and mobility causes.

With trundl, you can become part of a force for good; a like-minded community that adds to wellbeing every time you activate the app and go out walking. We help you set non-competitive walking goals, keep track of your progress and see the map of where you walked. Pledge to swap car-rides for walks (or trundls as we call them) and select which of trundl’s UK causes you would like trundl and brand partners to support. As we believe that everyone deserves extra reward for their good exercise intentions, you also get the opportunity to receive prizes and offers from trundl and our brand partners and fun badge recognition through the app.
You GO, we GIVE and you GET rewarded].

Here’s why we think you will love trundl:
Features
• A cheerful walking tracker that records time, distance and number of steps when you activate the app each time.
• Straightforward functionality that records even the shortest walk, making it accessible for older users and people with mobility challenges.
• You can set optional, non-competitive daily, weekly or monthly exercise goals (no nagging or losing a steak if you can’t get out for any reason). Our flexible goals let you choose how often you want to go out, how far you’d like to go each time and/or how many steps you would like to take.
• You can also feel motivated to help the environment by pledging to swap car rides for trundls on a regular basis.
• GPS tracking will let you see where you’ve been on each trundl (requires enabling location tracking).
• You can retain and view your trundls in a personal dashboard on the app.
• You’ll receive fun outdoor facts and wellbeing motivation through the end of trundl screen.
• You’ll be uplifted and rewarded with charming badges that recognise your serious exercise efforts.
• Companies can take out a group membership subscription for their teams to bring a fresh and inclusive approach to company fitness and inter-office connection.
• For extra motivation to get outdoors, you can add your steps when there is a trundl BOOST for a trundl cause
• You can learn about and select favourite trundl causes that you want trundl to support outside the app.
• You can take up offers and prize-draws from trundl and our brand partners.
• Your trundl experience will be ad-free, with no up-selling or commercialising of your data.

Make every step count with trundl - an app that is truly for all walks of life.

descriptionShort: A community-conscious outdoor walking app that rewards an active lifestyle
title: trundl

creator: trundl Limited
descriptionHtml:
With the non-competitive and rewarding trundl app, you can turn any outdoor walk into a charity donation and environmental CO2 saver. There’ll be no need for you to raise or donate any funds yourself as trundl and brand sponsors make the donations.

By joining trundl, for a small monthly fee you’ll become a member of a fabulous feel-good force for good:

- Good for your health as you’ll feel motivated and rewarded as part of a purposeful UK-wide walking community.
- Good for important nature and mobility-related UK charities that need our help.
- Good for the environment as with our CO2 Saver option we encourage you to leave the car at home more often.
- Good for your pocket as our brand partners extend offers that can be redeemed through the app.
We sum all this up in our GO GIVE GET promise – when you go, we give back and you get and feel rewarded.

Here are a few more reasons why we think you’ll love the trundl app:

- It’s easy to use. You can personalise walking targets against distance, time, frequency and steps. Or, if you’re not a fan of goals, just press ‘Go trundling’ to start straight away.
- With the CO2 Saver, you can track and record your positive impact upon the environment when you leave the car behind and walk instead.
- The ‘Me’ page allows you to see your personal impact on your own health, on the environment and our charity causes. You can also see and save outline maps of your walking journeys.
- You can decide which of trundl’s UK causes you would most like trundl and brand sponsors to support on your behalf. Charities we support include: UK National Parks, Dogs for Autism, The Trussell Trust, MOVE Against Cancer, Sussex Wildlife Trust.
- You will always enjoy and ad-free experience, with no up-selling. Ever.
- In addition to the offers from our lovely brand partners, unique trundl badges reward and encourage your continued health and charity-supporting progress.
- trundl truly is for all walks of life. Whether you like to hike in the hills, stroll to the shops, take a daily dog walk, or need some meaningful reasons to get healthier and fitter with even the shortest of walks, trundl is the community for you.

NOTE ON GPS : trundl depends on GPS for recording your outdoor walking or running activities. In some devices and locations, the GPS does not work properly and trundl may not always record effectively. If your trundl shows poor location estimations, please try to update the operating system to the most recent version and we provide some useful suggestions in the settings on the app. Unfortunately, there are some devices that have consistently poor performance across many GPS tracking apps, with no satisfactory remedies so far it appears. For trundl these include:
descriptionShort: Turn any outdoor walk into a charity donation with the rewarding trundl app.

NOTE ON GPS : trundl depends on GPS for recording your outdoor walking or running activities. In some devices and locations, the GPS does not work properly and trundl may not always record effectively. If your trundl shows poor location estimations, please try to update the operating system to the most recent version and we provide some useful suggestions in the settings on the app. Unfortunately, there are some devices that have consistently poor performance across many GPS tracking apps, with no satisfactory remedies so far it appears. For trundl these include:
descriptionShort: The walking app that donates to charity with your steps. Get rewards and offers.
title:
trundl - Steps for Charity
